title: NOCTURNAL VIBES: Electronic uptempo and dark ambient music
description: Up-tempo, high-energy electronic and dark/mysterious ambient original musical themes
longDescription:
AUDIO DEMO - Looping themes (Each theme is looped once to show the looping junction)

AUDIO DEMO - Full Themes (No-Looping)


If you are looking for OST, pristine, and professional-standard music tracks for your projects, this asset might interest you.


HIGHLIGHTS:

1-Composed, produced, and mastered by us.

2-RME FIREFACE UFX+ is used as the audio interface to ensure the highest quality.

3-The asset contains tracks in 48kHz & 44.1kHz (24-bit) specs.

4-Both looping and non-looping masters are included.

5-Smooth and cohesive impact on the project, as all the tracks are in the same musical key.

6-All rhythmic tracks are produced at the same tempo of 150 or half of it (75), thus allowing game developers to give the soundscape a cohesive appeal.

7-Royalty-free audio. Use in multiple projects.


Music Styles:

Electronic, Up-tempo, Dark Ambient, Pulsating


Music Suitability:

Scenes that require high-energy electronic music, cyberpunk, adventure, chase, Sci-Fi, modern lifestyle setups, dark, intense, and mystery.



Feel free to reach out to me at shashirajproductions@gmail.com for any concerns.
